Save the Date

Move aside Paris Olympics, the event of 2024 is happening on September 22nd and you're invited! Expect a beautiful ceremony at St. Anne's Chapel and a groovy reception at the San Diego Botanic Gardens. As for the rest of the weekend, expect the unexpected.
Additional information and formal invitations are coming soon, once we get the last of these homing pigeons fitted for tuxedos. But for now, please save the date! We can't wait to celebrate with you!

09.22.24

The Weekend

Rehersal Dinner

Saturday, September 21 | Early Evening

The wedding party will rehearse and have dinner on Saturday afternoon. Details will be sent to everyone in the Wedding Party.

Pacific Coast Grill
2526 S Coast Hwy 101
Cardiff

Welcome Drinks

Saturday, September 21 | Late Evening

Everyone is welcome to join us for drinks on Saturday evening! More info to come!

Pacific Coast Grill
2526 S Coast Hwy 101
Cardiff

Ceremony

Sunday, September 22 | Afternoon

The ceremony will take place at St. Anne's Chapel next to St. Theres of Carmel. (The ceremony be in a church, so please dress accordingly.)

Saint Anne's Chapel
4355 Del Mar Trails Road
San Diego, CA

Reception

Sunday, September 22 | Evening

The party will be held at the San Diego Botanic Garden's Conservatory. We will provide transportation from the church to the reception for anyone who needs it.

San Diego Botanic Gardens
300 Quail Gardens Drive
Encinitas, CA
